title: How to Build Trees in Minecraft

steps.title: Start from a flat surface and stack six logs on top of each other.
steps.content: Start from a flat surface and stack six logs on top of each other.

steps.title: Surround the third log with leaf blocks on all sides, making a cube.
steps.content: Surround the third log with leaf blocks on all sides, making a cube.

steps.title: Do another layer of leaves on top.
steps.content: Do another layer of leaves on top.

steps.title: Surround the top log with a cube of leaves.
steps.content: Surround the top log with a cube of leaves.

steps.title: Place an extra block of leaves at the center on top.
steps.content: Place an extra block of leaves at the center on top.
